original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimised_prompt:
<instructions>
    Extract named entities and classify them into categories: <category>Person</category>, <category>Location</category>, <category>Organization</category>, etc.
  </instructions>
  <context>
    The input will contain a sentence or a paragraph, after which you will extract and categorize the named entities found in the text.
  </context>
  <example>
    <input>EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb. Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22 The European Commission said on Thursday it disagreed with German advice to consumers to shun British lamb until scientists determine whether mad cow disease can be transmitted to sheep.</input>
    <output>
      <entity>
        <name>EU</name>
        <type>Organization</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>German</name>
        <type>Location</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>British</name>
        <type>Location</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>Peter Blackburn</name>
        <type>Person</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>BRUSSELS</name>
        <type>Location</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>The European Commission</name>
        <type>Organization</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>Germany</name>
        <type>Location</type>
      </entity>
      <entity>
        <name>Franz Fischler</name>
        <type>Person</type>
      </entity>
    </output>
  </example>
